name: SQLGenie
desc: A friendly SQL chatbot powered by LLAMA3, OPENAI, SQLCODER. SQLGenie assists with database queries, data visualizations, and training plans.

name: Automobile Damage Detection
desc: A vehicle damage detection system using advanced computer vision techniques to provide accurate, fast damage assessment and fraud detection.

name: JalSamadhan
desc: Empower communities in crisis to map and categorize water issues on a mobile app, aiding disaster response and providing insights for administrators.

name: BookFinder-LLM-Application
desc: BookFinder-LLM-Application uses RAG with GPT-2 from HuggingFace and Qdrant for efficient semantic search and response generation from PDF documents.

name: StreamDev
desc: Revolutionizing coding education with live streaming, real-time code editing, and Web3 integration for donations, fostering interactive learning and expert sharing.

name: LinkFluencer
desc: Streamlining influencer-company connections and event sponsorship through targeted matchmaking, robust support, and data-driven insights

name: EfficientMail
desc: EfficientMail, with Streamlit integration, streamlines email automation. Import mail ID's, input Gmail credentials, customize mail, effortlessly send personalized emails.

name: SentimentScope
desc: A simple web application built with Streamlit and Hugging Face Transformers library that performs sentiment analysis on user-provided text inputs.

name: Movie Recommender System
desc: This is a simple web application built using Streamlit, allowing users to discover movie recommendations based on their selected preferences.

name: Heart Disease Prediction
desc: Logistic regression model in interactive web application predicts heart disease presence using user input and Streamlit.

name: Health Insurance Price Prediction
desc: This repo houses a health insurance cost prediction model using machine learning. It offers estimates via a user-friendly Streamlit web app.

name: Iris Classification
desc: This repository features a Logistic Regression-based Iris data classification model trained on the well-known Iris dataset, encompassing flower measurements and species.

name: QR Code Generator
desc: QR Code Generator with Tkinter is a Python project that allows you to generate QR codes from input links and display them on the screen.

name: Portfolio Website
desc: Personal Portfolio Website. Don't Need Much Info About It, Just Scroll Down. You're Here Only!

name: WeatherApp
desc: A simple weather website that displays the current weather of the location searched. It uses Ninja-API for fetching data.

name: Temperature Converter
desc: The Temperature Conversion Tool simplifies temperature conversion between Celsius and Fahrenheit scales, offering a user-friendly and efficient solution.

name: Movie Ticket Booking System
desc: The primary objective of the system is to allows users to browse movie listings, select a showtime and choose their seats for their tickets online.
